item.title: Bath Body Works Inc 10-K
item.description: Bath Body Works Inc, which is in the Retail-Women’s Clothing Stores [5621] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 18, 2022 had 34062 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 449 instances million - 366 instances 2021 - 350 instances financial - 262 instances income - 258 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
